name: iAquaLink

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Start speaking with your pool today! To get started, select "Enable to use" to link to your iAquaLink® account. Devices discovered take system names as setup in your iAquaLink mobile app. Please rename devices after discovery for simplified voice control. Detailed instructions and FAQ's at iAquaLink.com/Alexa

Start speaking with your pool today! To get started, select "Enable to use" to link to your iAquaLink® account. Devices discovered take system names as setup in your iAquaLink mobile app. Please rename devices after discovery for simplified voice control. Detailed instructions and FAQ's at http://iAquaLink.com/Alexa

Required: A registered iAquaLink account and one or more connected systems compatible with Alexa commands.

Once Alexa is connected to your iAquaLink account, you can ask Alexa what the pool temperature is, turn on your spa, set your pool temperature, change light colors, turn on water features, turn on robotic pool cleaner — all without lifting a finger.
A full list of commands can be seen at iAquaLink.com/Alexa. Here are a few examples:

Alexa, turn on the spa
Alexa, turn on the pool
Alexa, turn on pool heater
Alexa, what is pool temperature
Alexa, set pool temperature to 75 degrees
Alexa, set pool light to blue
Alexa, switch on waterfall
Alexa, turn on robotic cleaner
